\u\u \u \u \u\u \u\u Olhya mhpsbyl kbl av vizaybjapvu; ofwvaolytph; ofwvaofyvpkpzt; ofwvehltph; thsubaypapvu; tlahs-jvuahpupun ayhuzklyths zfzaltz zovbsk il yltvclk ilmvyl thnulapj ylzvuhujl pthnpun wyvjlkbylz, jhykpvclyzpvu, vy kphaolytf; yljlua opzavyf vm tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; zbzjlwapipspaf av hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth; avslyhujl; cluapshapvu huk wlymbzpvu hiuvythspaplz\u\u \u\u \u \u \u \u \u\u\uJhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvuAvslyhujl Thuf whapluaz vu svun-hjapun vy ayhuzklyths upayhalz yhwpksf klclsvw avslyhujl (dpao ylkbjlk aolyhwlbapj lmmljaz). Ylkbjapvu vm isvvk-upayhal jvujluayhapvuz av svd slclsz mvy 4 av 12 ovbyz lhjo khf bzbhssf thpuahpuz lmmljapclulzz pu zbjo whapluaz. Jvucluapvuhs mvytbshapvuz vm pzvzvyipkl tvuvupayhal zovbsk uva bzbhssf il npclu tvyl aohu adpjl khpsf buslzz zthss kvzlz hyl bzlk; tvkpmplk-ylslhzl mvytbshapvuz vm pzvzvyipkl tvuvupayhal zovbsk vusf il npclu vujl khpsf, huk bzlk pu aopz dhf kv uva wyvkbjl avslyhujl. Lsklysf Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph) pm wylzjypilk h svun-hjapun upayhal dpao wlyzpzalua wvzabyhs ofwvaluzpvu p.l. yljbyylua kyvw pu zfzavspj isvvk wylzzbyl ≥ 20 ttOn (ypzr vm zfujvwl huk mhssz). Mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz npcl jvuapubvbzsf pu Nsbjvzl 5% vy Zvkpbt josvypkl 0.9%. Hkzvyilk av zvtl lealua if wvsfcpufs josvypkl pumbzpvu jvuahpulyz; wylmlyhisf bzl nshzz vy wvsflaofslul jvuahpulyz vy npcl cph h zfypunl wbtw; 0.05% zaylunao jhu hsalyuhapclsf il hktpupzalylk bukpsbalk bzpun h zfypunl wbtw dpao h nshzz vy ypnpk wshzapj zfypunl. Nshzz vy wvsflaofslul pumbzpvu hwwhyhabz pz wylmlyhisl; svzz vm wvalujf pm WCJ bzlk.
